content:
I'm excited to hear that you're going to try pour-over coffee. It's a great way to experience the unique flavors and aromas of high-quality coffee beans. Remember to experiment with different roasts, grind sizes, and brewing techniques to find your perfect cup.

By the way, I'm glad you mentioned running into your old friend from high school on the bus. It's always great to reconnect with familiar faces, especially during our daily commutes. Did you guys catch up on each other's lives and make plans to meet up again soon?
